title: #402: 2020 State of the Union Part 2 w/ Dave Smith
itunes:title: 2020 State of The Union: Part 2 with Dave Smith
description:
Dave Smith and I finish the last 4 hours of the craziest year of our state of the union podcasts we've ever done. There was just so much going on. We got into politics, the press, war, the way everybody's turning on each other, and the role of government. Dave was giving me eyes the whole time like he wanted more than just talk, if you get my drift. I 

Check out Dave's podcast "Part of the Problem" if you want more political talk.

Check out Dave's other podcast "Legion of Skanks" if you want to hear a guy who knows how to shut up about what happened after this podcast that we can never take back if he doesn't want to get muted. 

The Music

Public Enemy - State of the Union

John Lennon - All I Want is Some Truth

Grimskunk - America

Bruce Springsteen - This Land Is Your Land

Joe Rogan - Hugh Hefner

Please help support me at patreon.com/SkepticTank so I don't have to cry every time I lose a sponsor because I can't help but bring bestiality into an ad read if I think it's funny.
